title: Conversation
content:
Sorry for not replying

I was feeling emotional

You might have said how much you care for me a thousand times

But you still make me feel

When things happen

You would just walk away and disappear

I have learned not to believe in words

But actions

I have not dissapeared


But you were ready to just slowly fade away

I could feel it

Itâ€™s the same thing

what made you feel that


It just makes me sad that you still think I am the person I was


forgive me if you felt the slightest feeling that I was leaving, I am human after all, I fear of losing you too, for what is worth, there are no conditions for you to be in my life, no ifs, or buts, the moment you returned to my life I accepted everything as it is, and the same caring me shall remain even if you don't see it that way.


I know these are words, but I think I have proven enough of my actions to justify my change


I am not mad or upset, nor I have lost my composure despite everything going on in my life, I just want to ask you to understand me as a human being that is trying to change for the best


My thinking behind all this is rational rather than emotional, what kind of cruel selfish person would I be if I was against you trying to normalize and saving your relationship and living in a place where you feel at peace, I recognize that pursuing things my own gain will not set the example of person I want you to remember me for, I understand my own position in your life, even if we're never together I am already grateful you allowed me to be part of your life, don't worry about me in any way, I always find comfort and resiliency on the lessons of life, please recognize that I don't have any bad feelings about anything, and that I would not want to cause any suffering in your life, on the contrary I would always strive to be sweet towards you as you have been for me.


I may be the selfish one

Refuse to lose you

But not able to give what you want the most

Youâ€™re a wonderful person

You have always been

it was just my fear talking

I donâ€™t might fighting o

Or spilling the truth

I just canâ€™t stand the indifference

Like youâ€™re still there

But with distance

For you it could be a self protect mechanism to keep distance

And Iâ€™m just asking too much to still wanting all your sweetness

I panicked when you said the dice had just rolled again

I do think about what life it would be with you

Quite often

You would be a perfect father that a child could ever ask for

But things might not work out

Itâ€™s easier to let things stay where they are now

You have every right to feel upset

I should be the one that keeps distance

So you wouldnâ€™t be hurt by me

Sleep well, Billy

My dear, I choose not to feel upset, angry or jealous because I also have the right and the willingness to remain calm even if things are not in my favor, I would have regretted my entire life if I hadn't confessed you my feelings, or not knowing that you exist, I am extremely lucky I get to talk to such a wonderful, sweet, smart and pure person like you, just like you I do imagine a life together, I hear our kids running around in my imagination and you smiling which fills my heart of joy, I remember that day I held your hand and walked over that bridge at night the first time we met, in spite on the little time we had together, all these precious thoughts and memories have made me realize how grateful I should be that you exist in my life, things that I would otherwise would not have had been able to share with anyone else, more than anyone I understand your current position, every aspect of it I know it, I am aware of it, I am aware of the fear that you have on what I could think of all these things, your hesitation, your silence, your mood, all of it I am aware of everything that affects you, and I want you to know that I understand you, there will never be judgments from me, because I am a rational person, if we had kids I wouldn't want them to see me discussing and getting upset with their mother over things that make perfect sense when they're carefully discussed, although imagining a life with you has always been one of my greatest wishes in life, I have learned to detach myself from desire, and be very grateful for what I already have, because the world is a chaotic and unpredictable place and we must learn to live with the fact that some things are outside of our control, and I will always choose freedom, happiness and peace for you, I refrain myself from telling you my true feelings because it's so hard to prove things when I'm not there with you, many things are easier said than done, just know that I am not afraid of the future, that when the dices keep rolling, I will remain always calm so please don't fear or ache for me, I have learned from my mistakes and hardships in these past 5 years, I am a survivor, I have learned to live, so when you say that you should distance yourself from me to avoid hurting me, that's is not correct, please my sweet Juanita, stay, I'm asking you to stay, don't go, you'll always have a house in my heart, where you, Lucy and Mango can stay at anytime, like I said you have no restrictions to be in my life, I'm not indifferent to you, it's true that I protect myself by masking and concealing my emotions, because I'm the most vulnerable around you, as I have trusted you with many things that are important to me, I'm very careful with my words to you, because to me, you're a delicate soul and I should always be tender with you, forgive all the times I said things that have hurted you, thank you for reading what I have to say to you, sleep well my sweet Juanita.
